attributes.action: Make Larry the Cat Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details: Because the British people didn't have the option to vote for Larry, we're in a crisis so the time is now.
attributes.background: Boris is very incompetent,  so let's put the best person at No 10 in charge. Larry the Cat.

rejection.details: We can't publish petitions about honours or appointments. That includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or appointed.
